home.name: Your Apartment
home.description: A small studio apartment. It's modest but clean. Your bed sits in the corner, and a small kitchenette lines one wall. Sunlight streams through a single window overlooking the street.

street.name: Main Street
street.description: The heart of downtown. Cars pass by occasionally. You can see the gym to the north, a small café to the east, the bank to the south, and your apartment building to the west.

gym.name: 24/7 Fitness Gym
gym.description: A well-equipped gym with free weights, machines, and cardio equipment. The smell of rubber and determination fills the air. Motivational posters line the walls.

cafe.name: Coffee Bean Café
cafe.description: A cozy café with wooden tables and the rich aroma of fresh coffee. A few customers sit working on laptops. The barista is wiping down the counter.

bank.name: First National Bank
bank.description: A modern bank with polished floors and professional atmosphere. Tellers work behind glass windows. You see a loan officer at a desk in the corner.
